text: Gerardo Bujanda Sarasola (25 August 1919 – 4 September 2019) was a Spanish politician who served as a Deputy between 1977 and 1982. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Members of the 1st Congress of Deputies (Spain) Category:Members of the constituent Congress of Deputies (Spain) Category:Basque Nationalist Party politicians Category:Spanish military personnel of the Spanish Civil War (Republican faction) Category:Spanish centenarians Category:People from San Sebastián
title: Gerardo Bujanda Sarasola
